title: Jack Thompson Overtakes Pro Peloton on Other OTHER Tour de France
content:
Obviously, Lachlan’s Alt Tour has garnered a lot of attention, but another rider is doing an amazing Tour de France ride on his own. Jack Thompson started behind the race and has now passed it – though it’s a bit different than Lachlan’s attempt. “This year, I’m going to win the Tour de France. Albeit with a […]

The post Jack Thompson Overtakes Pro Peloton on Other OTHER Tour de France appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
